mapper.select: SELECT tb_deliverylog.dlid, tb_user.NAME, tb_property.pname, tb_deliverylog.spec, tb_deliverylog.number, tb_type.tname, tb_type2.t2name, tb_deliverylog.deliveryDate, tb_deliverylog.imgSrc, tb_deliverylog.remark FROM tb_deliverylog LEFT JOIN tb_user ON tb_deliverylog.NAME = tb_user.uid LEFT JOIN tb_property ON tb_deliverylog.pname = tb_property.pid LEFT JOIN tb_type ON tb_deliverylog.type = tb_type.tid LEFT JOIN tb_type2 ON tb_deliverylog.type2 = tb_type2.t2id ${ew.customSqlSegment}
